sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Christian meditations vpon eight Psalmes of the prophet Dauid. Made and newly set forth by Theodore Beza. Translated out of French, for the common benefite, into the vulgare tongue by I.S. Chrestiennes méditations. English Bèze, Théodore de, 1519-1605. Stubbes, John, 1543-1591.
[120] p.
In Bacon house, by Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie, Imprinted at London : [1582]
A translation, by John Stubbs, of: Bèze, Theodore de. Chrestiennes méditations sur huit psaumes du prophete David. Publication date from colophon. Running title reads: Beza vpon the penitentiall psalmes. Signatures: A-G H⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
Christian meditations vpon eight Psalmes of the prophet Dauid. Made and newly set forth by Theodore Beza. Translated out of French, for the common benefite, into the vulgare tongue by I.S. Chrestiennes méditations. English Bèze, Théodore de, 1519-1605. Stubbes, John, 1543-1591.
[120] p.
In Bacon house, by Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie, Imprinted at London : [1582]
A translation, by John Stubbs, of: Bèze, Theodore de. Chrestiennes méditations sur huit psaumes du prophete David. Publication date from colophon. Running title reads: Beza vpon the penitentiall psalmes. Signatures: A-G H⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
the Queenes most excellent Maiestie
Christopher Barker
